card.name: 300-TT Crusher Claw
card.property:
[Pierce 2]
When you put this on a character that has 19[STARS] or more > Tap an enemy [Decepticon] that has 10[STARS] or fewer.

card.name: Aerial Superiority
card.property: Choose one of your characters. When it attacks this turn, if it's a [Plane], [Helicopter], or [Spaceship] and is attacking a [Truck], [Car], or [Tank] > The chosen character gets +4[ATK] and [Pierce 4] until end of battle.

card.name: Alliance
card.property:
Play only if you had an [Autobot] and a [Decepticon] on your starting team.
Until end of turn, each of your characters' base [ATK] is 6.
At end of turn > Do 2 damage to each of your characters that attacked this turn.

card.name: Apex Armor
card.property:
Can't be put on [Decepticons].
When the upgraded character defends and you flip at least [K] > Move a damage counter from the upgraded character to the attacker.
When the upgraded character defends and you flip at least [O][B] > Repair 1 damage from the upgraded character. Do 1 damage to the attacker.

card.name: Assault Formation
card.property:
One of your [Melee] characters gets [Bold 2] until end of turn.
Move a damage counter from one of your [Ranged] chracters to an enemy.
Flip one of your [Specialists] to another mode.

card.name: Beast Mode
card.property: Choose one of your characters that's a [Predacon] or [Beast]. When it attacks an enemy in bot or body mode this turn > The attacking character gets [Bold 4] until end of battle.

card.name: Cacophonous Failure
card.property:
[Reveal] > As your opponent plays an Action with no battle icons.
[When Revealed] > Scrap that Action and it has no effect.

card.name: Cloaking Screen
card.property: The upgraded character has [Stealth] while untapped.

card.name: Cloud Cover
card.property:
[Reveal] > If one or more damage counters would be moved from one character to another.
[When Revealed] > Damage counters can't be moved between characters this turn.

card.name: Beastbox, Savage Interrogator
card.property:
[Stealth]
When you flip to this mode > Reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. If it's an Action, you may play it.

alternate.name: Beastbox, Savage Interrogator
alternate.property: When this attacks an enemy [Autobot] > This gets +2[ATK] until the end of turn.

card.name: Advanced Technology
card.property: Your Decepticon Shockwave, Cybertron Commander has +4[HEALTH].

card.name: Combaticon Enigma
card.property:
If you have Bruticus on the battlefield > He gets [Pierce 2] until end of turn.
If you have 5 [Combaticons] in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area > Combine them into Bruticus, Unstoppable Giant.

card.name: Cosmic Rust Cannon
card.property: When the upgraded character attacks > Do 1 damage to it. After the battle, do another 1 damage to that character unless you scrap an Upgrade from it.

card.name: Crack Back
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your characters defends and you flip battle cards.
[When Revealed] > If your defender's [DEF] is greater than the attacker's [ATK], do damage to the attacker equal to the difference.

card.name: Crushing Claws
card.property:
Up tp 2 Crushing Claws can fit into 1 of Scorponok's Weapon slots.
When the upgraded character attacks, if you have no other characters and flip at least [O][K][B] > Do 1 damage to each enemy.

card.name: Dare To Believe
card.property:
Draw a card.
One of your characters gets [Bold 1] until end of turn.

card.name: Death to the Weak
card.property: You may KO one of your characters that has 5 [STARS] or fewer. If you do, do 3 damage to an enemy and repair 3 damage from one of your other characters.

card.name: Electro Stinger of Scorponok
card.property:
Put on Scorponok only.
[Pierce 2].
This can't be scrapped by your opponent's cards.
While Scorponok has Crushing Claws and Zarak's Shield > He gets an additional [Pierce 5].

card.name: Energon Sword
card.property:
Put on [Melee] characters only.
When the upgraded character attacks and you flip at least [B][B] > The defender's base [DEF] becomes 0 during this battle.

card.name: Feral Tenacity
card.property:
Put only on [Predacons] or [Beasts].
When the upgraded character takes damage > Put 1 rage counter on this.
The upgraded character gets +1 [ATK] for each rage counter on this.
At the end of your turn > Remove all rage counters from this.

card.name: Grimlock's Sword
card.property: Put on [Dinobots] only. [Bold 3] [Pierce 3]

card.name: Blast Off, Space Warrior
card.property: When this attacks a [Tank] or [Truck] > This gets +2[ATK] until end of turn.

alternate.name: Blast Off, Space Warrior
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > Do 2 damage to a [Ranged] enemy.

card.name: Arise, Rodimus Prime
card.property:
Before the game begins > You may reveal a Matrix of Leadership from your deck and put it into your hand.
Up to three copies of Matrix of Leadership can fit into the utility slot of your Rodimus Prime, Worthy Leader.

card.name: H-M Laser Cannon
card.property:
Can't be put on [Decepticons].
When you put this on a [Guardian] or a character in combiner mode > Do 2 damage to each enemy.

card.name: Nothin's Gonna Stand In Our Way
card.property:
One of your characters gets [Pierce 1] until end of turn.
If this is the the third Nothin's Gonna Stand In Our Way you've played this turn > Untap one of your characters with 12 [STARS] or fewer.
You may play another Nothin's Gonna Stand In Our Way.

card.name: Particle Cannon of Galvatron
card.property:
Put on Galvatron only.
[Bold 1]

card.name: Racing Stripes
card.property:
Put only on [Motorcycles], [Sentinels], or [Stunticons].
When you flip battle cards while upgraded character defends > Until end of battle, the upgraded character gets +[DEF] equal to half the number of different battle icons flipped this battle, rounded up. Do that much damage to the attacker.

card.name: Resilience
card.property: Repair 5 damage from one of your characters that has 19 [STARS] or more. Then put this card into your KO area.

card.name: Scan the Vaults
card.property: Draw a card. Then draw a card for each Scan the Vaults in your scrap pile.

card.name: Sharkticon Mace
card.property: After the upgraded character attacks > Scrap this card. If the upgraded character is a [Sharkticon], put this on another [Sharkticon] instead.

card.name: Spoils of War
card.property: Choose up to 5 of your characters. If they share a trait, repair 1 damage from each of them.

card.name: Starscream's Cape
card.property:
Put on Starscream only.
This can be in an Armor slot.
Increase each number in the upgraded character's text box by 1. This effect does not modify abilities granted by upgrades or other effects.

card.name: Stasis Field
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your characters defends against an enemy in bot or body mode.
[When Revealed] > The attacking player flips that attacker to alt mode.

card.name: Bombshock, Military Patrol • Patrol Leader
card.property: This has [Stealth] while untapped. Each of your [Military Patrols] has +2[ATK].

alternate.name: Bombshock, Military Patrol • Patrol Leader
alternate.property: This has +1[ATK] and +1[DEF] for each Military Patrol in your KO area.

card.name: Arm the Lonely
card.property:
Your Raider Spinister, Infantry • Aerial Assault has +3 [HEALTH].
Once per game, at the start of your turn > You may put a [Battle Master] upgrade from your KO area onto your Raider Spinister, Infantry • Aerial Assault. If you do, flip this.

card.name: Stormfall Sword
card.property: [Pierce 2] While this is on Windblade > She has [Tough 1].

card.name: Survival of the Fittest
card.property:
[Reveal] > After your opponent chooses an attacker and before they choose a defender.
[When Revealed] > KO one of your characters. Then untap one of your other characters.

card.name: The Touch
card.property:
One of your Autobot [Leaders] gets [Bold 4] until end of turn.
If that character is upgraded with Matrix of Leadership > Repair 3 damage from it.

card.name: This is Bad Comedy
card.property: Choose an enemy character. Scrap a Utility from it, then do 1 damage to it.

card.name: Trithyllium Plating
card.property:
When you play this from hand > You may play a Trithyllum Plating from your scrap pile.
Up to 3 Trithyllum Platings can fit in 1 Armor slot.
While the upgraded character is defending against an enemy that has [Pierce] > Reduce that enemy's [Pierce] total by 2.

card.name: Tsunami Blaster
card.property:
Can't be put on [Autobots].
The upgraded character has [Bold 1] for each card under it, up to [Bold 4].

card.name: Twisted Logic
card.property:
[Reveal] > When one of your characters defends.
[When Revealed] > Reveal the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck. Put them back in any order.

card.name: Unfriendly Fire
card.property:
Put on [Combaticons] only.
When the upgraded character defends and your opponent flips battle icons of at least 3 different colors > Do 2 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Vamparc Ribbon
card.property: When the upgraded character attacks and does 4 or more attack damage > Repair 2 damage from the upgraded character.

card.name: Wanna Bet?
card.property:
[Reveal] > If one or more battle cards would be put under a character.
[When Revealed] > Until end of turn, if one or more battle cards would be put under a character, scrap those battle cards instead.

card.name: Brawl, Ground Assault
card.property: [Brave] [Bold 1]

alternate.name: Brawl, Ground Assault
alternate.property:
Enemies can't use [Brave] or [Stealth].
When this attacks an enemy that has an Armor > Do 1 damage to that enemy.

card.name: Barbaric Rage
card.property:
Your Galvatron, Maniacal Tyrant has +3 [HEALTH].
While your Galvatron, Maniacal Tyrant is in bot mode, he has +3[ATK] and "When this attacks > do 2 damage to one of your characters."

card.name: Zarak's Shield
card.property:
While this is on Scorponok > He gets +1[DEF].
While this is on Zarak > He can't take more than 3 attack damage from a single attack.

card.name: Bumblebee, Optimistic Brawler
card.property: When you flip to this mode > Draw a card. If you have another [Autobot] on the battlefield, draw another card.

alternate.name: Bumblebee, Optimistic Brawler
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > Each of your [Autobots] gets [Bold 1] until end of turn.

card.name: Brothers In Armor
card.property:
Your Sergeant Crosshairs, Artillery • Weapons Supervisor has +3[HP].
Once per game, at the start of your turn > You may put a [Battle Master] upgrade from your KO area on to your Sergeant Crosshairs, Artillery • Weapons Supervisor. If you do, flip this.

card.name: Cyclonus, Loyal Enforcer
card.property: When you flip to this mode > You may scrap a [W] from your hand. If you do, move 2 damage from this to an enemy.

alternate.name: Cyclonus, Loyal Enforcer
alternate.property: If one of your [Leaders] that has 10[STARS] or more would take attack damage > You may have this take that damage instead.

card.name: Bust Some Deceptichops!
card.property:
Your Ironhide, Veteran Autobot has +4[HEALTH].
When your Ironhide, Veteran Autobot battle a [Decepticon] > Ironhide gets [Bold 2] and [Tough 2] until the end of battle.

card.name: Dropshot, Relentless Soldier
card.property: This has [Stealth] while untapped.

alternate.name: Dropshot, Relentless Soldier
alternate.property: [TAP], Scrap an [O] card from your hand > One of your characters gets +4[ATK] until end of turn. At the end of turn, do 3 damage to that character.

card.name: Can't Squish This
card.property: While your Bombshell, Decepticon Psy Ops is defending against an attacker that has [Pierce] > Reduce the attacker's [Pierce] total based on the number of cards in your hand. • 1-4 > Reduce the attackers' [Pierce] total by 2. • 5-7 > Reduce the attackers' [Pierce] total by 3. • 8+ > Reduce the attackers' [Pierce] total by 4.

card.name: Do It With Style!
card.property: Replace the text "an enemy that doesn't have [Pierce]" on your Autobot Jazz, Special Ops with "an enemy that has 8 [STARS] or fewer."

card.name: Galvatron, Maniacal Tyrant
card.property: When you flip to this mode > You may scrap an enemy Upgrade.

alternate.name: Galvatron, Maniacal Tyrant
alternate.property: When this attacks, if his Upgrades include at least [W][B][G] and you flip at least [W][O][K] > Do 4 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Drop Your Weapons
card.property:
Your Bluestreak, Reluctant Soldier has +3[HEALTH].
When your Bluestreak, Reluctant Soldier defends in bot mode and you flip at least [W][O][B] > The attacker's base [ATK] becomes 0 during this battle.

card.name: Ghost of Starscream, Annoying Apparition
card.property:
Before the game begins > KO this.
When your Starscream is KO'd, if this is in your KO are > Return this to the battlefield fully repaird, even if you have no other characters. Put all Upgrades from the KO'd Starscream onto this instead of scrapping them.

alternate.name: Ghost of Starscream, Annoying Apparition
alternate.property: When this attacks > You may tap an enemy.

card.name: Gnaw, Voracious Hunter
card.property: When you flip to this mode > Return a [Mercenary] card from your scrap pile to your hand.

alternate.name: Gnaw, Voracious Hunter
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > One of your [Sharkticons] has [Bold 2] until end of turn.

card.name: Heat Resistant Body
card.property:
Your Inferno, Fearless Firefighter has +5[HP].
When you flip your Inferno, Fearless Firefighter to bot mode > Repair 1 damage from one of your [Autobots].

card.name: Grimlock, Dinobot King
card.property: When this attacks and you flip at least [O][K][B] > Do 1 damage to EACH character, then do 1 damage to EACH Decepticon.

alternate.name: Grimlock, Dinobot King
alternate.property: [Bold 3]

card.name: I Don't Break Rules, I Just Bend Them - A Lot.
card.property: Once per game, when you Sideswipe, Reckless Warrior is on the battlefield and you flip him to another mode > You may play up to two Upgrades from your KO area. If you play a card this way, flip this.

alternate.name: I Don't Break Rules, I Just Bend Them - A Lot.

card.name: Growl, Intimidating Thug
card.property: This has [Stealth] while untapped.

alternate.name: Growl, Intimidating Thug
alternate.property: [TAP], Scrap an [O] card from your hand > One of your characters gets [Bold 3] until end of turn.

card.name: Made of Sterner Stuff
card.property: Your Optimus Prime, Battlefield Legend has +3[HEALTH].

card.name: Mayhem
card.property:
Your Ruckus, Combat Assault has +2[HEALTH].
When your Ruckus, Combat Assault is on the battlefield and you flip him to another mode > Repair 1 damage from each of your [Cars]. One of your [Cars] gets [Bold 1] until end of turn.

card.name: Huffer, Sullen Engineer
card.property: When you flip to this mode > You may scrap a card from your hand. If you do, return a Utility from your scrap pile to hand.

alternate.name: Huffer, Sullen Engineer
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > You may scrap a card from your hand. If you do, you may play an Upgrade.

card.name: Jazz, Outta Sight, Dynamite Lieutenant
card.property: [Stealth] When you flip to this mode > Your opponent scraps a card at random from their hand. You may return a card that shares a card type with the scrapped card from your scrap pile to your hand.

alternate.name: Jazz, Outta Sight, Dynamite Lieutenant
alternate.property:
Each of your [Autobots] has [Pierce 2].
When you flip to this mode > Look at your opponent's hand.

card.name: Paranoia
card.property: Your Red Alert, Security Chief has "When you flip to this mode > You may scrap a scard from your hand. If you do, repair 1 damage from each of your characters."

card.name: Predacon Fortitude
card.property: For each card under your Sky-Byte, Harbinger of Doom > He has +1[HEALTH] and +1[DEF] up to +3[HEALTH] and +3[DEF].

card.name: Lord Zarak, Ruler of Nebulon
card.property:
[Head] + [Focus 1], [Tough 1]
This begins on Scorponok, Brutal Warlord in head mode. This can't flip.
When Scorponok is KO'd > Deploy this to the battlefield in body mode, even if Scorponok was your last character.

alternate.name: Lord Zarak, Ruler of Nebulon
alternate.property:
[Focus 2]
Tough 2
When you deploy this from under Scorponok > You may put a Zarak's Shield from Scorponok onto this.

card.name: Megatron, Autobot Bane
card.property: When this is KO'd by the effect of Peace Through Tyranny > Do 2 damage to an enemy [Autobot].

alternate.name: P38 Fusion Blaster
alternate.property:
[Bold 1]
If another Weapon would be put into the same Upgrade slot as this > Scrap that weapon instead.
If this would leave the battlefield while upgrading a [Decepticon] [Leader] that has 10 [STARS] or more > Instead deploy this to the battlefield in bot mode tapped with 6 damage counters on him.

card.name: Quest for Fire
card.property:
Your [Firecons] have +2[HEALTH].
Before the game begins > You may reveal a Firecon Flame from your deck and put it into your hand.

card.name: Scout the Area
card.property:
Your deck can have up to 2 extra [STARS] of [W] cards.
Once per game, at the start of your turn > You may deploy a character from under Trypticon, Assault Base to the battlefield. If you do, flip this.

card.name: Onslaught, Combaticon Leader
card.property: Each of your other [Combaticons] has [Bold 1] and [Tough 1].

alternate.name: Onslaught, Combaticon Leader
alternate.property:
When you flip to this mode > Draw a card.
When one of your [Combaticons] attacks > [Plan 1].

card.name: Starscream's Brigade
card.property: If your starting team has Onslaught and at least one other [Combaticon], your Starscream, Scheming Second-in-Command has "[TAP], Discard a [K] Action from your hand > Choose a [Combaticon] you own from the outside the game that you do not already have on the battlefield or in the KO area and deploy it to the battlefield in alt mode with 2 damage on it."

card.name: Ratbat, Calculating Scout
card.property:
[Stealth]
[TAP], Scrap a [W] from your hand > Each player chooses two cards from their hand and scraps the rest. Each player with fewer than 2 cards in hand draws cards equal to the difference.

alternate.name: Ratbat, Calculating Scout
alternate.property: Once per turn, if your opponent would draw a card, except for the first card they draw at the start of their turn > You draw a card instead.

card.name: Ratchet, Chief Medical Officer
card.property: When you flip to this mode > Repair 2 damage from one of your characters.

alternate.name: Ratchet, Chief Medical Officer
alternate.property: While this is your only character on the battlefield > He has [Bold 2] and [Tough 2].

card.name: Such Heroic Nonsense [Ark Version]
card.property: When your Megatron, Decepticon Leader is on the battlefield and you flip Hunker Down while battling > After the battle, you may swap a card from your hand for a Hunker Down you flipped this battle as though it had [G].

card.name: Unstoppable
card.property: At the start of your turn, if Wreck-Gar, Junkion Leader is in your KO area > You may put up to 4 Upgrades from your scrap pile into your KO area. If you do. return Wreck-Gar to the battlefield untapped and repair 2 damage from him for each Upgrade you put into the KO area this turn.

card.name: Red Wing, Thrillseeker
card.property: [Tough 1]

alternate.name: Red Wing, Thrillseeker
alternate.property: [Revenge] > Your opponent scraps 2 cards from their hand.

card.name: Rewind, Data Collector
card.property:
[Stealth]
When you flip to this mode > Return a card at random from your scrap pile to hand.

alternate.name: Rewind, Data Collector
alternate.property: After you flip battle cards for this character's attack and before defense flips > You may play a [K] Utility you flipped.

card.name: Rodimus Prime, Worthy Leader
card.property: When you flip to this mode > Return a Matrix of Leadership from your scrap pile to hand.

alternate.name: Rodimus Prime, Worthy Leader
alternate.property: When this is upgraded with Matrix of Leadership > He has +1[ATK] and [Pierce 2].

card.name: Rumble, Demolition Expert
card.property:
[Stealth]
When you flip to this mode > Your opponent chooses one of their Upgrades and scraps it.

alternate.name: Rumble, Demolition Expert
alternate.property: When this attacks, you may scrap a [B] card from your hand > If you do, this gets +3[ATK] until end of turn.

card.name: Scorponok, Brutal Warlord
card.property:
Before the game begins > You may put an Electro Stinger of Scorponok from your deck onto this.
When you flip to this mode > Draw a card.
This begins with Lord Zarak, Ruler of Nebulon on him in head mode.

alternate.name: Scorponok, Brutal Warlord
alternate.property:
[Bold 1]
When this attacks > You may play one of your flipped Upgrades onto this after the battle. If you don't play an Upgrade this way, flip this.

card.name: Scourge, Opportunistic Tracker
card.property:
Your starting [STAR] limit increases by 1 for each [Sweep] on your starting team.
Enemies can't use [Brave] or [Stealth] against this or your [Sweeps].

alternate.name: Scourge, Opportunistic Tracker
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > One of your [Sweeps] gets [Pierce 2] until end of turn.

card.name: Seaspray, Valiant Vessel
card.property: This has [Stealth] while untapped.

alternate.name: Seaspray, Valiant Vessel
alternate.property: When this battles an enemy in bot mode > This gets +1 [ATK] and +1 [DEF] until end of battle.

card.name: Sharkticon, Feeding Frenzy
card.property:
[Horde 3]
Revenge > Untap one of your tapped [Sharkticons]. If you don't, draw a card.

alternate.name: Sharkticon, Feeding Frenzy
alternate.property: [TAP], Scrap a [K] card from your hand > Draw a card. Then you may play a card.

card.name: Sideswipe, Reckless Warrior
card.property: While this has a Weapon with two or more battle icons > This gets +2[ATK].

alternate.name: Sideswipe, Reckless Warrior
alternate.property: When this attacks > You may put a Weapon with +[ATK] in its stat box from your hand or scrap pile into your KO area. If you do, this gets that much +[ATK] until end of turn.

card.name: Sky-Byte, Harbinger of Doom
card.property: When this attacks > Put the top 3 cards of your deck face down under this.

alternate.name: Sky-Byte, Harbinger of Doom
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > Play a card from under this. Scrap that card at the end of turn.

card.name: Specialist Countdown, Transport • Space Explorer
card.property:
Your starting [STAR] limit is increased by 2 if Omega Supreme is on your starting team.
This has [Stealth] while you have Omega Supreme on the battlefield.

alternate.name: Specialist Countdown, Transport • Space Explorer
alternate.property: [TAP] Scrap a card from your hand > Draw 2 cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your deck. If you have a character in combiner mode, instead draw 3 cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

card.name: Sunstreaker, Arrogant Daredevil
card.property:
[Bold 1]
When you flip to this mode > You may tap another of your untapped [Autobots] that has the same number of [STARS] or fewer than this. If you do, untap this.

alternate.name: Sunstreaker, Arrogant Daredevil
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > You may scrap a card from your hand. If you do, return a Weapon from your scrap pile to hand.

card.name: Sweep, Scourge's Armada
card.property:
[Horde 3]
[Stealth]
This can't take non-attack damage from your opponent's cards.

alternate.name: Sweep, Scourge's Armada
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > This can attack untapped enemies this turn as though they were tapped.

card.name: Swindle, Arms Dealer
card.property: When you flip to this mode > Return an upgrade from your scrap pile to your hand.

alternate.name: Swindle, Arms Dealer
alternate.property:
When this attacks an [Autobot] > You may play a weapon.
When this defends against a [Decepticon] > You may play an armor.

card.name: Tracer, Ambitious Scout
card.property: This has [Stealth] while untapped.

alternate.name: Tracer, Ambitious Scout
alternate.property: [TAP], Scrap an [O] card from your hand > Scrap the top card of your deck. If it's an Upgrade, you may play it.

card.name: Vortex, Interrogator
card.property: [Pierce 2]

alternate.name: Vortex, Interrogator
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > Your opponent scraps a card from their hand.

card.name: Wheelie, Rhyming Racer
card.property: [Stealth] against [Decepticons] and [Mercenaries].

alternate.name: Wheelie, Rhyming Racer
alternate.property: [TAP], Scrap a card from your hand > Your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it. If the scrapped card has two or more battle icons, instead do 2 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Windblade, Camien Champion
card.property: When you flip to this mode > Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put 1 Action and 1 Upgrade from among them into your hand. Scrap the rest.

alternate.name: Windblade, Camien Champion
alternate.property: If this would take attack damage and you flipped battle icons of at least four different colors this battle > Instead this takes half that damage, rounded up.

card.name: Wreck-Gar, Junkion Leader
card.property: When this battles > You may scrap an Upgrade from this. If you do, choose one: • This gets +2[ATK] until end of turn. • This gets +2[DEF] until end of turn. • Repair 2 damage from this.

alternate.name: Wreck-Gar, Junkion Leader
alternate.property: When you flip to this mode > You may return an Upgrade from your scrap pile to your hand.

card.name: Bruticus, Unstoppable Giant
card.property: [Bold 2], [Tough 2], [Pierce 2] When this attacks on the turn he's combined > For each battle card you flip that has at least [K], do 1 damage to an enemy.
